text: The 1987 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship was won by Zielona Góra on July 11, 1987. ==European final== *July 11, 1987 * Zielona Góra, SPAR Arena ==See also== 1987 European Individual U-21 Individual U-21 Category:Speedway competitions in Poland
title: 1987 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
